There is no way to contact the developer, which is frustrating, but I did submit a support ticket to explain how the Home Screen widget doesn‚Äôt work and how the app is experiencing some glitches. I‚Äôve received no response from them. Really disappointed, as I believe this app could have helped me a lot, but when the developer is unresponsive and the app is glitchy and buggy, it‚Äôs not worth $70 a year. And there‚Äôs no free version. Really disappointed.', 'author': 'MKAB82', 'version': '6.16.0'}, {'date': '2026-01-05', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Good content but bad follow through', 'content': 'I don‚Äôt typically leave reviews, but this upset me. I was supposed to receive a notification before the subscription renewed because I just download this app less than a week ago. I received no notification and it charged my account $50! I do not believe I‚Äôm paying $50 for an app with content that can be provided free by other apps. I wanted to try this out to see if I enjoyed it, but apparently I just paid $50 for a few ‚ÄúI am‚Äù statements and now I‚Äôm stuck with this app until 2027 knowing I will never use it again. They need to be more clear about the fact that you will not receive a notification before the subscription period renews. I can‚Äôt seem to stop it and I can‚Äôt believe I have to ‚Äúlive‚Äù with this annoying disturbance that should have simply disappeared. I don‚Äôt even get a ‚Äúcalming‚Äù phrase, it‚Äôs JUST an alarm! What the heck can I do now? One of the few times I DONT read reviews and this is what happens. It‚Äôs inconvenient to have to do all that pressing & it discourages me from using it more actually.', 'author': 'SamFenn', 'version': '6.16.0'}, {'date': '2025-12-29', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Self-written affirmations no longer read aloud?', 'content': 'I loved this app because I could customize the affirmations that I can play to be read aloud and even add my own so they‚Äôre more specific. This was great for falling asleep to affirmations, hearing them and recording them airing my morning routine, etc. I love all the new features and styles in the app, but it no longer reads the self-written affirmations out loud! Huge disruption for me. I hate to be looking at the screen the whole time during the practice. Barely worth using anymore. Going to cancel if that feature doesn‚Äôt come back. Also there used to be multiple voice options and now there‚Äôs just one voice. Luckily it‚Äôs not bad, I just like to explore variety. Please bring back the ability to read self-written affirmations aloud and more voice variety!
